files.patch:
@@ -119,6 +119,7 @@
-    "1: lwarx   %0,  0, %2    \n"
-    "   add     %0, %0, %1    \n"
-    "   stwcx.  %0,  0, %2    \n"
-    "   bne-    1b            \n"
-    : /*%0*/"=&r" (result)
-    : /*%1*/"r" (add_value), /*%2*/"r" (dest)
+    "1: lwarx   %[result], 0, %[dest]                 \n"
+    "   add     %[result], %[result], %[add_value]    \n"
+    "   stwcx.  %[result], 0, %[dest]                 \n"
+    "   bne-    1b                                    \n"
+    : [result]     "=&r"  (result)
+    : [add_value]  "r"    (add_value),
+      [dest]       "r"    (dest)
@@ -145,6 +146,7 @@
-    "1: ldarx   %0,  0, %2    \n"
-    "   add     %0, %0, %1    \n"
-    "   stdcx.  %0,  0, %2    \n"
-    "   bne-    1b            \n"
-    : /*%0*/"=&r" (result)
-    : /*%1*/"r" (add_value), /*%2*/"r" (dest)
+    "1: ldarx   %[result], 0, %[dest]                 \n"
+    "   add     %[result], %[result], %[add_value]    \n"
+    "   stdcx.  %[result], 0, %[dest]                 \n"
+    "   bne-    1b                                    \n"
+    : [result]     "=&r"  (result)
+    : [add_value]  "r"    (add_value),
+      [dest]       "r"    (dest)
